response.overview: "BANGHAY: Bangka, Hangin, at Buhay" is a captivating documentary that explores the tradition of naming winds in Malaban, Binan, Laguna. Through a compelling blend of folklore and science, the film uncovers the significance of these wind names to the local fishing community and their connection to the environment. By showcasing the interplay between tradition and modern knowledge, "BANGHAY" highlights the importance of preserving cultural heritage for future generations. This underscores the System Thinking Approach and Future-Proof Pedagogy in promoting conservation of culture and community in a sustainable way.
response.title: Banghay
